title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: In the Export Zip feature, when updating the checkboxes, a busy cursor should be shown. Currently, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
OB: The busy cursor is not shown while updating the checkboxes.
EB: While updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, a busy cursor should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the Export Zip feature. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose the desired file types. 5. Press the 'OK' button.
